name: Chrome Cross Pendant
description: Solid .925 sterling silver pendant with a brutalist, gothic design. Hangs from a heavy 24-inch Cuban link chain. The centerpiece of the uniform.

name: Spiked Leather Choker
description: Genuine grain leather choker with polished steel cone spikes and an adjustable buckle closure. Raw and refined, designed for the jugular.

name: Silver Armor Ring Set
description: A set of three interlocking sterling silver rings designed to mimic gothic armor. Fully articulated for movement, covering the entire finger.

name: Barbed Wire Leather Belt
description: Thick-cut leather belt featuring a custom-molded barbed wire-style buckle in tarnished silver. An aggressive statement piece.

name: Distressed Sigil Cap
description: Unstructured cotton twill cap, heavily distressed with frayed edges. Features a cryptic, embroidered sigil on the front panel.

name: Safety Pin Chain Earring
description: A sterling silver safety pin connected by a fine link chain to a simple stud. A nod to punk heritage, refined. Sold as a single piece.

name: Leather Utility Harness
description: A full-body harness constructed from panels of soft leather and nylon webbing. Features multiple D-rings and a concealed zip pocket. Purely aesthetic, entirely essential.

name: Monogram Knit Scarf
description: An oversized, heavyweight jacquard knit scarf. Features a deconstructed, repeating monogram pattern in black and off-white. Finished with thick tassels.
